summary:
Full retetexture of skyrim paper, this includes any kind of book or note.

-Ultra increased resolution:
==Books: from 512x512 to 2048x2048
==Notes: from 256 x256 to 1024x1024
-Much more detailed paper.
-Improved normal maps.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]As all my mods, it's FREE and NEXUS-EXCLUSIVE, if you see it on Steam it's stolen.[/size][/center]
[img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/497/mainbl.gif[/img]
Full retetexture of skyrim paper, this includes any kind of book or note.

-Ultra increased resolution:
==Books: from 512x512 to 2048x2048
==Notes: from 256 x256 to 1024x1024
-Much more detailed paper.
-Improved normal maps.

------------------------
Instalation:
-----------------------

1./ Copy the content in that folder into your Data folder (usually: program files/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data)
2./ Overwrite if prompted

--------------------------
Uninstallation:
---------------------------
Just delete the textures, the path is:
- Data/Textures/Clutter/books

Enjoy playing skyrim and if you like my retexture: please, come back and endorse. Thanks in advance.
author: FrankFamily
